item.title: [317] Teleporting Problem [317] WILL REP
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“kickingjamie, post:6, topic:445420”] public void triggerTele(int x, int y, int height) { if (System.currentTimeMillis() - magetimer > 500) { if (playerRights != 4) { magetimer = System.currentTimeMillis(); resetWalkingQueue(); } else if (wildyLevel >= 20 && isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1) && !isinsafewild() || multiPK() && !isinsafewild()) { sM("You cannot teleport past level 20 Wilderness."); return; } if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastTeleblock < 300000) { sM("You are teleblocked!"); return;

Put this method in your client class.[/quote]
That’s not even a full method.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Teleporting Problem [317] WILL REP
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

public void triggerTele(int x, int y, int height) { if (System.currentTimeMillis() - magetimer > 500) { if (playerRights != 4) { magetimer = System.currentTimeMillis(); resetWalkingQueue(); } else if (wildyLevel >= 20 && isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1) && !isinsafewild() || multiPK() && !isinsafewild()) { sM("You cannot teleport past level 20 Wilderness."); return; } if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastTeleblock < 300000) { sM("You are teleblocked!"); return;

Put this method in your client class.

teleportToX = 3213;
teleportToY = 3424;
break;

but it does not get the animation with it

Please Help!!! I will respect!!
